description: This file defines a React functional component 'Login' which provides a login screen with email and password inputs, handling authentication and navigation upon success.

methods.name: Login()
methods.description: React functional component rendering a login form, managing email/password states, handling form submission for login, and redirecting upon successful login.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Event handler for form submission; calls login function with email and password, then navigates to dashboard if successful.
